name: Orpheus (August Moon)
description:
A demo for a possible game based on the tale of Orpheus and Eurydice.

Controls: Left arrow key to move left, Right arrow key to move right, Up arrow key to jump

Players can jump on green/pink souls, but not on white souls. 

Players can collect extra lives. 

Credits: "Ghost LVL 1, 2, 3" by Antifarea

"Heart 2" by Nicole Marie T

"LPC Sign Post" by Nemisys
